definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 4)/see 撇[pie3]
long term/long time/long range (of a forecast)
head of a household/family head/patriarch/parent or guardian of a child
head of a (government etc) department/section chief/section head/secretary/minister/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4],名[ming2]
Changsha prefecture-level city and capital of Hunan province in south central China
president of a club, committee etc
to extend as long as/to lengthen out to

sentences.english: I saw a plant growing out of a crevice in the wall.
sentences.chinese: 我看到牆縫裏長出一棵草來。

sentences.english: All grocery shopping bags contain at least one stick of French bread.
sentences.chinese: 所有超市購物袋裏都裝着至少一根法式長棍麪包。

sentences.english: The body is brawny, limbs forceful, head round eyes, short neck little kiss long.
sentences.chinese: 軀體粗壯，四肢強健有力，頭圓頸短，眼小吻長。

sentences.english: Fat A triglyceride of a long-chain carboxylic acid that is solid below 20℃.
sentences.chinese: 一種長鏈羧酸的甘油三酯，20℃以下爲固態。

sentences.english: South African plant widely cultivated for its showy pure white spathe and yellow spadix.
sentences.chinese: 長有耀眼的純白色苞和黃色纖維的一種南非種植植物。

sentences.english: Still, Japan quickly suspended imports of American long-grain rice.
sentences.chinese: 日本立即做出反應，暫緩對美國長粒大米的進口。

sentences.english: Total settlement of composite foundation still decreases with the length of column.
sentences.chinese: 但地基的總體沉降量仍然隨樁長增加而線性減小。

sentences.english: None of these champions remotely resembles the long-side illustration.
sentences.chinese: 插圖顯示沒有一個冠軍使用類似長的身體姿勢的姿勢。

sentences.english: The bine is erect, base ministry lignification, foliaceous each other is unripe, wrap around needle form or long elliptic.
sentences.chinese: 莖豎立，基部木質化，葉互生，披針形或長橢圓形。

sentences.english: Will the Himalaya Mountains, home to the world's highest peaks, continue to push up into the sky in future?
sentences.chinese: 擁有世界最高峯的喜馬拉雅山還將繼續“長高”嗎？

sentences.english: Being talented just like being gravid , must be known with a long time past.
sentences.chinese: 懷才就像懷孕，時間長了才能知道。

sentences.english: Most animals walking on four legs have long muzzles.
sentences.chinese: 大多數用四肢走路的動物口鼻部分都相當長。

sentences.english: Kenny is not good-looking, but he is very gentle.
sentences.chinese: 肯尼長得不好看，但是他很有紳士風度。

sentences.english: He saw only her long chestnut lashes , permeated with shadow and modesty.
sentences.chinese: 他只見到栗色的長睫毛，掩映着幽嫺貞靜的神態。

sentences.english: Encased at the tip of each 25-foot-long rod are seeds provided by China’s Kunming Institute of Botany.
sentences.chinese: 每個25長的突觸頂端嵌有由昆明植物園提供的種子。

definition: far/distant/remote/(intensifier in a comparison) by far/much (lower etc)
still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else
to see/to meet/to appear (to be sth)/to interview
to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
(name of states and dynasties at several different periods)/surname Qi
neat/even/level with/identical/simultaneous/all together/to even sth out
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]
feeling or desire to do sth/interest in sth/excitement
to rise/to flourish/to become popular/to start/to encourage/to get up/(often used in the negative) to permit or allow (dialect)/maybe (dialect)
between/among/within a definite time or space/room/section of a room or lateral space between two pairs of pillars/classifier for rooms
gap/to separate/to thin out (seedlings)/to sow discontent
president of a club, committee etc
to cross/to go over/to pass (time)/to celebrate (a holiday)/to live/to get along/excessively/too-
Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua
